Package ch.pschatzmann.starschema.views.calculation

Summarization of information
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICalculationVisitor
    We calculate totals by visiting all relevant facts
    ICalculator
    Interface which is used to provide the calculation results in a map
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculationResultMerger
    Merges total records to a grand total
    Calculator
    We sequentially read thru the whole fact table and add up each record using TotalForOneFact fact records for each key.
    CalculatorWithThreads
    We split up the fact table into n buckets and process these in parallel.
    TotalCountDistinct
    Implementation of a calculator which is providing the sum, min, max, count and average.
    TotalForAllFacts
    Implementation of a calculator which is providing the sum, min, max, count and average for all fact attributes.
    TotalForOneFact
    Implementation of a calculator which is providing the sum, min, max, count and average.
    TotalRecord  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Operations
